publisher.publisher-name: Department of Romance Languages (University of Michigan)

title-group.article-title: ASPECTS LOGIQUES DE L'INTERTEXTUALITÉ: Pour une approche sémiotique de la poésie de Julián del Casal

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1976 Department of Romance Languages, Univesity of Michigan
